short_description: Implements the train name finder SQL/MR function.
long_description: Implements the train name finder SQL/MR function.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: The input table containing text column to train.
input_tables.description: The input table containing text column to train.

argument_clauses.name: TextColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the text to analyze.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the text to analyze.

argument_clauses.name: EntityType
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the entity type to be trained (for example, PERSON). The input training documents must contain the same tag.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the entity type to be trained (for example, PERSON). The input training documents must contain the same tag.

argument_clauses.name: Model
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the data model file to be generated.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the data model file to be generated.

argument_clauses.name: IterNum
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the iterator number for training (an openNLP training parameter). The default value is 100.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the iterator number for training (an openNLP training parameter). The default value is 100.

argument_clauses.name: Cutoff
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the cutoff number for training (an openNLP training parameter). The default value is 5.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the cutoff number for training (an openNLP training parameter). The default value is 5.
